name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YouTube & Google Drive Videos Remaining Time & Playback Duration Left

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize YouTube and Google Drive videos remaining playback time left, along with the current time and total duration of the video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize the remaining playback time (or time left) of videos from YouTube and Google Drive, next to the current time and the total duration of the video.
